Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Aplasia/Hypoplasia of the radius 90% Split hand 90% Hypoplasia of the ulna - Short finger - Split foot - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
